channel.title: [Class Suggestion]The Tavernkeeper/The Innkeeper
channel.description:
> # [color=steblue]The Tavernkeeper[/color] :shield: > **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon Support[/color]** > > **Passive (Royal Blood)** - During the election for a new king , votes for you will count twice. > **Passive (Some Time Off)** - All players visiting you will be healed of **Nightshade** and **Bleeding**. Additionally , if a player visits you they will become a **Patron**. If they visit you again the next night , they will be healed BUT they will lose their **Patron Status**. > > **Day Ability (Good Host)** - All players visiting you tonight will become **Immune to Death** for the night and they will get the **Patron** status. You will also become **Immune to Death** for the night.(1 Use) > **Day Ability (Charismatic)** - You will become **Occupy/Redirection & Death Immune** tonight.(2 Uses) > > **Night Ability (Leaflets)** - Give a player a leaflet. Anyone attempting to visit them the next night will get occupied.(Infinite Uses - Not Usable until N3 - You will lose the effects of **Some Time Off** and **Good Host** for the night.) > **Night Ability (It's Only Business)** - Stand outside a player's room , granting them **Death Immunity** and **Occupation/Redirection Immunity** for the night.(2 Uses - Only works on **Patrons** - You will lose the effects of **Some Time Off** and **Good Host** for the night.) > **Goal : **[color=steblue]The Blue Dragon[/color]**'s Goal.** > > **[color=purple]Converts into:[/color]** > > # [color=purple]The Innkeeper[/color] :shield: > **[color=purple]Unseen Support[/color]** > > **Passive (Royal Blood)** - During the election for a new king , votes for you will count twice. > **Passive (Managing Business)** - You will not be able to talk with **[color=purple]The Unseen[/color]** at night. You will know who **[color=purple]The Unseen[/color]** are. You can not become **[color=purple]The Assassin[/color]** unless all **[color=purple]The Unseen[/color]** members are dead. You will gain 1 charge of **Nightshade** instead of 4 and 3 charges of **Distract** instead of 2. Your **Nighstade** will take 1 less day to take effect. > > **Day Ability (Bad Host)** - All players visiting you tonight can not be healed for the night.(1 Use) > **Day Ability (Secret Note)** - Send a message to **[color=purple]The Unseen[/color]**.(Infinite Uses) > > **Night Ability (Posters)** - Give a player a poster. Their **Death Immunity** will be removed for the night. **[color=purple]The Unseen[/color]** will be announced.(2 Uses - You will lose the effects of **Bad Host** for the night) > **Night Ability (Secret Meeting)** - Select 2 players. If one of them dies , the other dies as well. You will die with them.(1 Use - You will still have the effects of **Bad Host**) > **Goal: **[color=purple]The Unseen[/color]**'s Goal.**
# Important Note I'm sorry if I'm giving this class too much confirmability BUT you will know who are your patrons.

item.dc:creator: Geyde

Maybe replace it with an ability that heals all people that visit you that night (maybe 2 use).

item.title: [Class Suggestion]The Tavernkeeper/The Innkeeper
item.dc:creator: NAOtheRitualist
item.description:
The Tavernkeeper

Blue Dragon Support

Passive (Royal Blood) - During the election for a new king , votes for you will count twice.
Passive (Some Time Off) - All players visiting you will be healed of Nightshade and Bleeding. Additionally , if a player visits you they will become a Patron. If they visit you again the next night , they will be healed BUT they will lose their Patron Status.

Day Ability (Good Host) - All players visiting you tonight will become Immune to Death for the night and they will get the Patron status. You will also become Immune to Death for the night.(1 Use)
Day Ability (Charismatic) - You will become Occupy/Redirection & Death Immune tonight.(2 Uses)

Night Ability (Leaflets) - Give a player a leaflet. Anyone attempting to visit them the next night will get occupied.(Infinite Uses - Not Usable until N3 - You will lose the effects of Some Time Off and Good Host for the night.)
Night Ability (It’s Only Business) - Stand outside a player’s room , granting them Death Immunity and Occupation/Redirection Immunity for the night.(2 Uses - Only works on Patrons - You will lose the effects of Some Time Off and Good Host for the night.)
Goal : The Blue Dragon’s Goal.

Converts into:

The Innkeeper

Unseen Support

Passive (Royal Blood) - During the election for a new king , votes for you will count twice.
Passive (Managing Business) - You will not be able to talk with The Unseen at night. You will know who The Unseen are. You can not become The Assassin unless all The Unseen members are dead. You will gain 1 charge of Nightshade instead of 4 and 3 charges of Distract instead of 2. Your Nighstade will take 1 less day to take effect.

Day Ability (Bad Host) - All players visiting you tonight can not be healed for the night.(1 Use)
Day Ability (Secret Note) - Send a message to The Unseen.(Infinite Uses)

Night Ability (Posters) - Give a player a poster. Their Death Immunity will be removed for the night. The Unseen will be announced.(2 Uses - You will lose the effects of Bad Host for the night)
Night Ability (Secret Meeting) - Select 2 players. If one of them dies , the other dies as well. You will die with them.(1 Use - You will still have the effects of Bad Host)
Goal: The Unseen’s Goal.

Important Note

I’m sorry if I’m giving this class too much confirmability BUT you will know who are your patrons.

Read full topic
